title: 80 - Faith Deconstruction & Real Stories - LIVE Show At Villain Studio
description:
LIVE from Villain Studios in Placenta, CA.  We discuss the topic of faith deconstruction and it's trending interest.  Also, some folks share a little bit about how they've come to question the Christian culture they have been handed.

- Mike Erre

Learn more about the VOX Podcast:
www.voxpodcast.com

Subscribe on iTunes - http://apple.co/1Lla1Nj
Music provided by Izzi Ray - http://www.soundcloud.com/izziray
